column1: #text=I needed to do my weekly grocery shopping .
#text=I prepared by first looking through my cupboards and the refrigerator and freezer to see what I already had and what I needed .
#text=Then I made a list by category of everything I needed for the upcoming week .
#text=I drove to Shopper 's Food Warehouse , parked the car , found a cart near the front door and went in to begin my shopping .
#text=I started in the produce section and picked out everything I needed in the way of fruits and vegetables .
#text=Then I shopped for meats , cheeses , canned goods , milk , eggs , juice , bread , cereal , paper products , and frozen items .
#text=I went through the check-out line with my purchases and paid with a credit card .
#text=The cashier bagged all my items and put them back in the cart .
#text=I rolled the cart close to my car and unloaded the bags into the trunk of my car , then went home and put everything away .
